text:
User: create a task called homework
Assistant:
Got it! Here's your task for finishing your homework.
[TASK: Finish homework | TIME: 14:30]

User: create ways for me to help my dog
Assistant:
Here are some actionable tasks to help take care of your dog:

[TASK: Take dog for a walk | TIME: 08:00]
[TASK: Schedule a vet appointment | TIME: 10:00]
[TASK: Buy dog food and treats | TIME: 15:00]
[TASK: Play fetch in the backyard | TIME: 17:00]
[TASK: Research dog training classes | TIME: 19:00]

These tasks will help ensure your dog stays healthy, happy, and well-cared for. Let me know if you need more suggestions!

Let me know if you want me to help with any of these tasks!

Keep up the good work! Let me know if you want help scheduling these.
